## Acceptance Criteria
<!-- Define what success looks like for this feature -->

### Functional Requirements
- [ ] Feature solves documented user need
- [ ] Implementation is backwards compatible
- [ ] Feature works as designed
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate

### Technical Requirements
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] New functionality includes comprehensive tests
- [ ] Code follows project standards (`make lint`)
- [ ] Security considerations addressed (`make security`)
- [ ] Documentation updated appropriately
- [ ] Performance impact assessed

### Quality Requirements
- [ ] Feature meets all acceptance criteria ([docs/acceptance-criteria.md](../docs/acceptance-criteria.md))
- [ ] User experience is intuitive
- [ ] Integration with existing features is seamless
- [ ] Migration path provided if breaking changes
